title:
NACC Uniform Data Set (UDS) Form M1: Milestones
 Please submit a new Milestones Form as soon as possible after each milestone event has occurred.
description: INSTRUCTIONS: Review the types of milestone below and complete the appropriate box below.   Use only one box (A or B) per form submitted.   For more information, see flow chart.

note_mlstn_type.title: What milestone are you reporting?
note_mlstn_type.description:
1.  Data-collection status CHANGE followed by CONTINUED CONTACT with subject.  The subject's status in the UDS or FTLD Module has changed, such that s/he will continue to be followed (at least minimally) by ADC.
 2.  Change followed by NO FURTHER CONTACT with subject.  Subject has DIED or been DROPPED FROM ADC with no further telephone contact and no minimal contact (such as to obtain autopsy).
enum: 0 No further Contact,  Box B only

box_a.title: BOX A - CHANGE WITH CONTINUED CONTACT

changeyr.title: 1c. Date of status change, year
changeyr.description: Date can be submitted as YYYY(1875 to 2099)

uds_ftld_sect.title: Complete the UDS and FTLD sections below, as appropriate

protocol.title: 2a. UDS data collection status changed; subject's new status is (CHECK ONE):
enum: 1 Annual UDS follow-up by telephone (CONTINUE TO QUESTION 2a1)
2 Minimal contact (CONTINUE TO QUESTION 2a1) NOTE: Minimal contact status is reserved for subjects who can no longer participate for one of the reasons llisted in Question 2b, below.
3 Annual in-person UDS follow-up  (CONTINUE TO QUESTION 2b6)

change_reason.title: 2b. Reason(s) for change indicated in Question 2a (CHECK AT LEAST ONE):

rephyill.title: 2b2 Subject is too ill or physically impaired

rerefuse.title: 2b3 Subject refuses neuropsychological testing or clinical exam

renavail.title: 2b4 Subject or co-participant unreachable, not available, or moved away

renurse.title: 2b5 Subject has permanently entered nursing home

nursemo.title: 2b5a. Month permanently moved to nursing home.
nursemo.description: Date permanently moved to nursing home, 1-12,99 = Unknown

nursedy.title: 2b5b. Day permanently moved to nursing home.
nursedy.description: Date permanently moved to nursing home,1-31,99 = Unknown

nurseyr.title: 2b5c. Year permanently moved to nursing home.
nurseyr.description: Date permanently moved to nursing home,YYYY(1875 to 2099), year required

ftlddisc.title: 3. Subject will no longer receive FTLD Module follow-up, but annual in-person UDS visits will continue

ftldreax.title: 3a1. Other reason no FTLD Module follow up
ftldreax.description: Any text or numbers with the exception of single quotes ('), double quotes (), ampersands (&), and percentage signs (%).

deceased.title: 4a. Subject has DIED (COMPLETE DEATH SECTION, BELOW)

discont.title: 4b. Subject has been DROPPED from ADC (COMPLETE DROPPED SECTION, BELOW)

autopsy.title: 5b. ADC autopsy:
enum: 1 An ADC autopsy has been done; data submitted or pending

dropped.title: DROPPED
dropped.description: DO NOT fill out this section if the subject has consented to autopsy or if you will maintain minimal contact. Instead, fill out Box A, UDS STATUS section.

dropreas.title: 6b. Main reason for being dropped from ADC (CHECK ONE):
enum: 2 Subject or co-participant asked to be dropped

uds_ftld_sect.change_reason.nursedy.title: 2b5b. Day permanently moved to nursing home.

uds_ftld_sect.change_reason.nurseyr.title: 2b5c. Year permanently moved to nursing home.

uds_ftld_sect.ftld_module.ftlddisc.title: 3. Subject will no longer receive FTLD Module follow-up, but annual in-person UDS visits will continue

uds_ftld_sect.ftld_module.ftldreax.title: 3a1. Other reason no FTLD Module follow up

box_b.deceased.title: 4a. Subject has DIED (COMPLETE DEATH SECTION, BELOW)

box_b.discont.title: 4b. Subject has been DROPPED from ADC (COMPLETE DROPPED SECTION, BELOW)

dropped.dropreas.title: 6b. Main reason for being dropped from ADC (CHECK ONE):
